text: Alpine skiing at the 1986 Asian Winter Para Games took place in Sapporo, Japan from 4 April 1986 with four events contested â€” two each for men and women. ==Medalists== ===Men=== Slalom Giant slalom ===Women=== Slalom Giant slalom ==Medal table== ==References== Category:1986 in Asian sport 1986 Asian Winter Para Games
